text:
Hi ! I am looking to build a "blog" in HubSpot without the ability to have individual posts, does anyone know if there is an easy way to disable single blog posts for a certain blog ?
Thanks!
Hi <@U010VBF1WDD> - can you expand a bit more on what you mean by "individual posts"

Hey Nikan, sure I meant single post pages, ideally I would like to have a blog specially for listing with external links, and its single pages not be present (with direct url routes and from search engines)
